question: Who has become the first Indian cricketer to bowl 3 maidens in single T20I?
explanation: Off-spinner Deepti Sharma from Agra has become the 1st Indian cricketer to bowl 3 maidens in T20I. This history was created during the Indiaâ€™s first T20I against South Africa at the Lalabhai Contractor Stadium in Surat, Gujarat. She ended with figures of 4/8 with three of the four overs to lead India to victory.  India beat South Africa by 11 runs to take a 1-0 lead in the five-match series.
